views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 8, 9, 10 and 11

iOS 11 Dock Style For iOS Devices.
Tweak will work immediately after installing.
Contact me if some new feature can be added :-)

Configure options from Settings.

Remove the highlight line of dock view. Add support for iOS 8, 9 and 11. Fixed the layout problems. Now compatible with more tweaks. Fixed some bugs.


Supported 5 icons now.(No switch, enable by default)

Re-arrange icons just like iOS 11 when the number of icons less than 4. (Screen shots below)

Fixed some bugs with wallpapers which contain light color.

All the features test with 4.7' devices, if you have some problems with devices which have different screen size, please contact with me. :-)


Dock is floating now.
Remove some useless code.
Added a preference bundle now, tweak was switched to off with default settings.
Added an option to show dock icons names.
